Name: Ghost
Overview: Ghost is a free and open-source blogging platform written in JavaScript and distributed under the MIT License, designed to simplify the process of online publishing for individual bloggers as well as online publications. This version includes mapping for MariaDB and SMTP. Big credits to Bitnami for the amazing image. Another fine product, brought to you by IBRACORP.
DonateText: Help support my work by buying me a beer

@attributes.Name: GHOST_HOST
@attributes.Description: If you want to access your application from a public IP or hostname you need to set this environment variable to your public IP or hostname. E.g. blog.example.com

@attributes.Name: GHOST_EMAIL
@attributes.Description: Ghost application email. Default: user@example.com

@attributes.Name: BLOG_TITLE
@attributes.Description: Ghost blog title. Default: User's Blog

@attributes.Name: MARIADB_HOST
@attributes.Description: Hostname for MariaDB server. Default: mariadb

@attributes.Name: MARIADB_PORT_NUMBER
@attributes.Description: Port used by MariaDB server. Default: 3306

@attributes.Name: GHOST_DATABASE_NAME
@attributes.Description: Database name that Ghost will use to connect with the database. Default: bitnami_ghost

@attributes.Name: GHOST_DATABASE_USER
@attributes.Description: Database user that Ghost will use to connect with the database. Default: bn_ghost

@attributes.Name: GHOST_DATABASE_PASSWORD
@attributes.Description: Database password that Ghost will use to connect with the database. No defaults.

@attributes.Name: ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD
@attributes.Description: It can be used to allow blank passwords. Default: no

@attributes.Name: SMTP_HOST
@attributes.Description: SMTP host. E.g. smtp.gmail.com

@attributes.Name: SMTP_PORT
@attributes.Description: SMTP port. E.g. 587

@attributes.Name: SMTP_USER
@attributes.Description: SMTP account user. E.g. your_email@gmail.com

@attributes.Name: SMTP_PASSWORD
@attributes.Description: SMTP account password.

@attributes.Name: SMTP_FROM_ADDRESS
@attributes.Description: SMTP from address.

@attributes.Name: SMTP_SERVICE
@attributes.Description: SMTP service to use. E.g. GMail or Mailgun

@attributes.Name: SMTP_SECURE_CONNECTION
@attributes.Description: Use a secure connection for SMTP. true or false

@attributes.Name: GHOST_PROTOCOL
@attributes.Description: Protocol to use in the application URLs. Valid values are https or https. Default: http

@attributes.Name: GHOST_USERNAME
@attributes.Description: Ghost application username. Default: user

@attributes.Name: GHOST_PASSWORD
@attributes.Description: Ghost application password. The minimum length is 10 characters. Default: bitnami123

@attributes.Name: WebUI
@attributes.Description: WebUI Port

@attributes.Name: Appdata
@attributes.Description: Appdata
